code: import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{useContext,useState}from"react";import{AuthContext}from"../../context/authcontext.js";import Reserve from"../reserve/reserve";import{useEffect}from"react";import QRCode from"qrcode";import"./separate_qr.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const A_qr_Block=_ref=>{let{item}=_ref;const{user}=useContext(AuthContext);const[openModal,setOpenModal]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleClick=()=>{navigate("/Admin/".concat(item._id));};const[src,setSrc]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{QRCode.toDataURL("name : ".concat(item.name,", city: ").concat(item.city,", address: ").concat(item.address,", no.of adults: ").concat(item.adult,", no.of children: ").concat(item.children,", total fee: ").concat(item.total_fee,", email: ").concat(item.email)).then(i=>{setSrc(i);});});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cover",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mon_container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mon_cards",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mon_image",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"mon_img",style:{"marginTop":"20px"},src:src,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"monrating",children:"".concat(item.name)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mon_min_details",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"place",children:"".concat(item.city)})})]})})})}),openModal&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Reserve,{setOpen:setOpenModal})]});};export default A_qr_Block;
